name: Whiteboard
description: My attempts on the office whiteboard. These little art attempts kept my juices running. They kept me in touch with my artistic side.

name: Project Skin
description: One of my fun projects. The main aim was to create a skin for my laptop, everything else just fell into place.

name: Landscapes
description: My first attempts at serious digital paintings.

name: Moods
description: The Sky is much more than just a blue background.

name: Raise the Dead
description: Here I detail out on what went through to envision and draw the Necromancer from Warcraft: Frozen Throne.  I captured all the intermediate stages so that the reader can relive at what went through to create this.

name: Avatars
description: All my different avatars that I had created.  From way early days when I first started to draw digitally.  You will find how the avatars evolved from my early feeble attempts.

name: First Digital Comics
description: My first attempt on a digital comics. This is the first Valentine's day of me and my then fiancee new wife.
publication: This was picked up by Fried Eye, a web publication, for 2012 February Valentine's day.

name: Project Etch
description: Here I put out the characters that I had done to be later etched onto my laptop.

name: Second Digital Comics
description: My next digital comics. A proper primer on how newspapers come into being.

name: Third Digital Comics
description: My third attempt on a digital comics. Had a chance to draw some superheroes.
publication: This was on display boards on DevCon event held by Cerner on September 2018.

name: Doodles
description: All my doodles.

name: An Agent
description: Adventures of an Agent. Ok, original character and story much inspired by James Bond and other fun stuff.

name: A Diwali Mission
description: A Hostel Five Story. More importantly a Hostel Five Diwali!
publication: This got published in Souvenir, a magazine released by my Engineering College on September of 2021 celebrating it's 60th Anniversary.

name: Art of VS 50
description: Artwork done for VS 50, a game I built and deployed in Mesmerize.

name: Agent Shots: Aibohphobia
description: A mini-comics about Agent. This one is based on a Programming joke.

name: Immortal Kombat
description: A komics based on the game Mortal Kombat. FIGHT!

name: Inner Brahma
description: A concept or an idea that I follow, presented here
publication: This got published on April 2024, in the 15th edition of Gogona.

name: The Knot
description: Digital version of the printed book

name: Elf and the Robot
description: A father daughter collaboration for a fantasy
publication: This got published on April 2025, in the 16th edition of Gogona.

name: Making Stories
description: A meta commentary on the making of Gogona
publication: This got published on April 2025, in the 16th edition of Gogona.

name: Agent Shots: Patience
description: A mini-comics about Agent. This one is inspired by another one that I am working on.

name: All Wallpapers
description: All the wallpapers
